name: Maze of Deciet
description:
You found yourself in an abandoned old castle, you are trying to find your way out. You try to follow the signs to the exist but you find out they are not always telling the truth.

The clock is ticking, you have a limited time to make it out of here alive before the whole place locks down.

Controls:

Use the Arrows or "WASD" keys to move.

Use "E" to interact with objects.
